results.deck: Secret Weapons Over Normandy is a flight simulation game set in World War II, in which players take control of James Chase, an American pilot. The game features American, British, Soviet, Japanese and German aircraft.  (A TIE Fighter and X-wing are also unlockable)
results.name: Secret Weapons Over Normandy

results.deck: Sequel to KAO the Kangaroo on the Dreamcast, Kao the Kangaroo Round 2 features familiar 3D platforming, charming visuals and soundtrack
results.name: Kao the Kangaroo Round 2

results.deck: Released in 2002 for Xbox and Playstation 2, Blood Omen 2 answered many questions about Kain's rise to power while asking a few new ones.
results.name: Legacy of Kain: Blood Omen 2

results.deck: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Critical Hour is the fifth game in the Rainbow Six series. This entry is intended to take the series back to its tactical roots, which had been stripped away in the previous game to make the series more appealing to the mass market.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Critical Hour

results.deck: Mace Griffin Bounty Hunter is a futuristic sci-fi shooter that follows in the footsteps of previous futuristic sci-fi shooters.
results.name: Mace Griffin: Bounty Hunter

results.deck: A turn-based modern military tactics game released for the Xbox in 2004 and in the US in early 2005. It was later released for PS2 and PSP.
results.name: Dai Senryaku VII: Modern Military Tactics

results.deck: The sequel to 4x4 Evolution, 4x4 Evo 2 is an offroad racing game developed by Terminal Reality
results.name: 4x4 Evo 2

results.deck: Vexx is a 3D platformer developed by Acclaim's Austin Studio (formerly Iguana Entertainment). The design borrowed liberally from open-world platformers like Super Mario 64, but with tough competition from new franchises Rachet & Clank and Jak & Daxter, Vexx had a difficult time making a blip on the radar.
results.name: Vexx

results.deck: 2002's version of EA's annual basketball franchise.  Steve Francis of the Houston Rockets was the cover athlete.
results.name: NBA Live 2002

results.deck: It's a baseball game!
results.name: High Heat Major League Baseball 2004

results.deck: Scaler is a platformer released in 2004 for all three major consoles. Published by Take-Two Interactive.
results.name: Scaler

results.deck: F1 2002 was the second last Formula 1 game released by EA before losing the official license to Sony Computer Entertainment. It featured drivers, tracks and races from the 2002 Formula 1 World Championship. The game also featured an advance telemetry feature that allowed users to view race infomation.
results.name: F1 2002

results.deck: AirForce Delta Storm is the sequel to the flight game, AirForce Delta. Released for the Xbox and Game Boy Color in 2002.
results.name: AirForce Delta Storm

results.deck:
Circus Maximus: Chariot Wars is a chariot racing game set in ancient Rome.

Each chariot is manned by both a driver and a fighter. The player must control the steering of the driver and also cross chariot combat with the fighter. The driver and fighter can be controlled individually in co-op.
results.name: Circus Maximus: Chariot Wars

results.deck: Black Stone: Magic & Steel is a dungeon crawler game in the vein of Baldur's Gate or Gauntlet. Developed in Japan by XPEC and published in North America, Europe and Japan by different publishers.
results.name: Black Stone: Magic & Steel

results.deck: More redneck truckers! More roadkill! More skinheads! More mullets! Big Mutha Truckers is back in the form of Big Mutha Truckers 2: Truck Me Harder, a driving/racing game developed by Eutechnyx.
results.name: Big Mutha Truckers 2: Truck Me Harder

results.deck: Originally created as a modification of the original Half-Life, Counter-Strike has since become its own franchise, setting new standards in online team-based shooters, and was at one point the single most-played online game in the world with a huge competitive following.
results.name: Half-Life: Counter-Strike

results.deck: Tak and Lok are the representatives for the Pupanunu tribe in the Great Juju Challenge. It's up to the player to guide these two heroes through the 15 trials in order to win the blessing of the Moon Juju.
results.name: Tak: The Great Juju Challenge

results.deck: The four heroes of the Conflict: Desert Storm games return in this strategic third-person action game. This time the missions take place all over the world across a variety of terrain with a fictional counter-terrorism setting.
results.name: Conflict: Global Terror

results.deck: Follow Mace Windu, Obi-Wan, and Anakin, as the fight through the early battles of the clone wars against Count Dooku and his ancient weapon "The Dark Reaper".
results.name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars

results.deck: Phenom is the second game in Midway's NBA Ballers series.
results.name: NBA Ballers: Phenom

results.deck: NHL 06 is the first NHL game to be released after the NHL Lockout of 2005.  It features a slight graphical upgrade.  This is the last NHL game on the GameCube.
results.name: NHL 06

results.deck: The third entry in the Soul series, and being the first to release on all major home consoles. SC II was also the first in the series to introduce exclusive cameos from other franchises.
results.name: Soulcalibur II

results.deck: Mortal Kombat: Armageddon is the seventh installment in the violent fighting game franchise, featuring the most complete Mortal Kombat roster to date.
results.name: Mortal Kombat: Armageddon

results.deck: NHL Hitz 20-02 is an arcade hockey game with an emphasis on fast, high-scoring, hard-hitting gameplay.
results.name: NHL Hitz 20-02

results.deck: The Suffering: Ties That Bind is a sequel of the action-oriented horror game; The Suffering.  It picks up the story immediately where the last one left of and features the same engine as the last game with improve graphics and gameplay elements.
results.name: The Suffering:  Ties That Bind

results.deck: An open-world brawler RPG developed by Cavia and published by Capcom.
results.name: Beat Down: Fists of Vengeance

results.deck: Madden 2004 introduced Playmaker Controls and owner mode to the Madden franchise.
results.name: Madden NFL 2004

results.deck: Worms Forts: Under Siege is a turn based strategy game by Team 17 which worms must destroy the enemy team or their stronghold
results.name: Worms Forts: Under Siege

results.deck: Iron Phoenix is a free roaming 3D weapon-based fighting game which included online multiplayer for up to 16 players. The game was panned by critics for it's sloppy controls, frame rate issues, and lack of a meaningful single player.
results.name: Iron Phoenix

results.deck: Tony Hawk's Project 8 was the first game in the Tony Hawk series built from the ground up for 7th generation of consoles. The game introduced the Nail-The-Trick mechanic and added graphical details like Bloom HDR lighting and ragdoll physics.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Project 8

results.deck: Released on July 14, 2003.  Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004 is the first Tiger Woods game to feature the Gameface (create a player) feature, as well as online play for the PS2 edition.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004

results.deck: In Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance II, five new heroes battle through hordes of enemies and venture forth to rescue the protagonists of the first game.
results.name: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance II

results.deck: Jet Set Radio Future is set in a futuristic Tokyo. The follows a gang of J-pop inspired skaters and their efforts to fight an oppressive regime with music, urban mischief and spray-paint while beating off rival gangs.
results.name: JSRF: Jet Set Radio Future

results.deck: Street Basketball game licensed by AND 1 that most critics and players have agreed is mediocre.
results.name: AND 1 Streetball

results.deck: Fighters from multiple Street Fighter franchises, the Darkstalkers series, and Red Earth all battle out (with their own fighting game systems) in this 2D fighting game crossover.
results.name: Capcom Fighting Evolution

results.deck: Pro Race Driver is a racing video game that puts the player in the shoes of Ryan McKane, a race driver trying to make a name for himself in numerous car championships.
results.name: Pro Race Driver

results.deck: The game continues straight after the movie with some Hulk smashing action and some stealth elements.
results.name: Hulk

results.deck: NASCAR Thunder 2003 is a NASCAR game where you can ride around a track at high speeds, and create your own cars.
results.name: NASCAR Thunder 2003

results.deck: The sequel to the Geomod charged first-person shooter Red Faction, Red Faction II focuses on a military-driven storyline instead of the uprise of a lowly miner.
results.name: Red Faction II

results.deck: Spyro makes an amazing return as it tries to comeback from the disasters of the previous game.
results.name: Spyro: A Hero's Tail

results.deck: Need for Speed Underground is considered to be one of the best NFS games, and one of the best selling ones, selling 15 million copies world wide.
results.name: Need for Speed Underground

results.deck: Play old school Sonic  with 20 titles to choose from including Sonic the hedgehog and Sonic 3D Flickies Island. Relive the memories in the best Sonic games to come from Sega.
results.name: Sonic Mega Collection Plus

results.deck:
Steel Battallion: Line of contact is the follow-up to the original Steel Battallion game also released on the Xbox.
This game however supports the Xbox Live online feature.
Like the original game it utilizes the oversized gamepad used to control the vertical tank (VT).
results.name: Steel Battalion: Line of Contact

results.deck: The third outing for Sam Fisher finds him battling against terrorists who want to take control of the world using a simple algorithmic code.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

results.deck: The Madness returns to Midtown as the open-world racing game makes it's console debut on the Xbox.
results.name: Midtown Madness 3

results.deck: An arcade-style shooter that puts the player in control of a helicopter, with access to several weapon modes and the ability to cloak.
results.name: Fire Blade

results.deck: The follow-up to the 1998 blockbuster, Metal Gear Solid 2 blends tactical stealth and action. This sequel takes the action to an offshore oil cleanup facility seized by terrorists who are holding the President hostage. It helped sell the PS2, featuring advanced AI, physics and cover mechanics for its time, and one of the first postmodern narratives in gaming.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty

results.deck: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit 2 is the sequel to the 1998 blockbuster racing game, NFS III. Like its predecessor, it features high-speed police chases in exotic cars around a variety of locales around the world.
results.name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit 2

results.deck: SSX On Tour is the fourth game in the SSX franchise.
results.name: SSX on Tour

results.deck: A college basketball game from 2K Sports.
results.name: College Hoops 2K6

results.deck: An action role-playing game by Climax Studios, which was first released on the Xbox and later appeared on the PC.
results.name: Sudeki

results.deck: A Pack of 3 light gun games.
results.name: Crime Fighter 3 Pack

results.deck: The player took on the role of the main character from the movie Rodney Copperbottom. The GBA version should not be confused with the console versions which were heavily inspired by two excellent titles at the time, namely 'Jak and Daxter' and 'Ratchet and Clank'.
results.name: Robots

results.deck: Starring the demi-god Sphinx, and the undead corpse of Tutankhamen, this action-adventure game is filled with Ancient Egyptian mythology.
results.name: Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy

results.deck: An action/adventure role playing game from the developers behind Chronicles of Riddick and The Darkness. The game was never released outside Europe.
results.name: Knights of the Temple: Infernal Crusade

results.deck: Following on from the success of THPS2, the original Tony Hawks Pro Skater 2 saw a re-release on the Xbox with additional content and unlockable bonuses, including five new levels and improved graphics.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2x
World Championship Poker 2 featuring Howard Lederer

results.deck: Darkwatch is an action packed Wild West FPS in which the player takes on the role of a cowboy who becomes cursed with vampiric powers.
results.name: Darkwatch

results.deck: This game takes the four-man squad dynamic of the Conflict: Desert Storm games and transplants it into the setting of the Vietnam war.
results.name: Conflict: Vietnam

results.deck: Fantastic Four is an action adventure game based on the 2005 film Fantastic Four. Players play as the characters of the Fantastic Four using combos and special attacks to fight their way through hordes of enemies and bosses.
results.name: Fantastic 4

results.deck: Rugby League 2 is a Rugby League Sports game created by Sidhe Interactive. It allows players to play as their favourite NRL or Super Leams in a variety of single player modes and in offline multiplayer.
results.name: Rugby League 2

results.deck: Crimson Skies: High Road to Revenge takes the player on an aerial joyride through various environments set in the Crimson Skies universe.
results.name: Crimson Skies: High Road to Revenge

results.deck: Fight both legendary and obscure Batman villians in this 3D action-adventure game based on the "Modern Age" Batman comic book series.
results.name: Batman: Dark Tomorrow

results.deck: Cruise the streets of Rockport City, keep away from the cops, and defeat the wily Razor Callahan in this open-street racing game from EA Black Box.
results.name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted

results.deck: The 2005 release of EA Sport's Cricket franchise.
results.name: Cricket 2005

results.deck: NFL 2K5 continued the NFL 2K series with an improved presentation featuring ESPN personalities such as Chris Berman, Trey Wingo, and Suzy Kolber.
results.name: ESPN NFL 2K5

results.deck: The X-Men must battle the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants and the Sentinels as they attempt to make the world a better place for Mutants and humans alike.
results.name: X-Men: Legends

results.deck: A more action-orientated sequel to the original Elevator Action.
results.name: Elevator Action Returns

results.deck: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance is a hack-and-slash adventure set in Dungeons and Dragons' Forgotten Realms universe.
results.name: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance

results.deck: A Real Time Strategy game based in the Aliens and Predator universe, the game lets you play three different campaign modes. Predator, Alien, and Marines. The three different campaigns have different gameplay elements.
results.name: Aliens Versus Predator: Extinction

results.deck: Prisoner Of War is an action adventure game set in World War II,  where you must escape various Nazi Prisoner Camps by using Stealth and Cunning.
results.name: Prisoner of War

results.deck: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger is a 3D platformer made by Krome Studios. In it, Ty travels around the Australian outback in search of five mystical talismans that will not only save his family from the Dreamworld, but his entire species from the wrath of Boss Cass.
results.name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger

results.deck: Ford Racing 2 expands over its predecesor by adding more cars and tracks, new game modes and detailed graphics; a game marketed mostly for the hardcore Ford enthusiast.
results.name: Ford Racing 2

results.deck: FlatOut is a demolition derby-style racing game with destructible cars and environments.
results.name: FlatOut

results.deck: Xbox exclusive reimaging of the Far Cry franchise. Initially follows the PC version loosely before branching out into an entirely different adventure.
results.name: Far Cry: Instincts

results.deck: Join Peter, Stewie, Brian and the rest of the Griffins, and stop Mr. Belvedere's evil plans, help Stewie take over the world, and help clear Brian's name. Verse opponents seen in such episodes as "Emission Impossible", "Sibling Rivalry", and "Screwed the Pooch".
results.name: Family Guy Video Game!

results.deck: The third 3D worms game improves on its predecessor with more options and more mayhem.
results.name: Worms 4: Mayhem

results.deck: EA's 2002 entry in the NBA Live series, featuring New Jersey Nets point guard Jason Kidd on the cover. A separate soundtrack disk was included, and was given an RIAA Platinum certification when the game sold over a million copies.
results.name: NBA Live 2003

results.deck: Breakdown is a first person shooter/brawler released on the Xbox in 2004.
results.name: Breakdown

results.deck: Codemaster's popular cricket franchise returns for a fifth outing. Brian Lara International Cricket 2005 features improved graphics, new modes and fully-licensed ICC tournaments
results.name: Brian Lara International Cricket 2005

results.deck: Backyard Wrestling: Don't Try This At Home is a wrestling game where you have to defeat your enemy in the bloodiest way possible.
results.name: Backyard Wrestling: Don't Try This at Home

results.deck: WWE Raw 2: Ruthless Aggression is an Xbox exclusive wrestling game and sequel to 2002's WWF Raw.
results.name: WWE Raw 2

results.deck: Burnout 2: Point of Impact is the second game of the Burnout franchise and features intense racing through the United States.
results.name: Burnout 2: Point of Impact

results.deck: Become the Don by extorting businesses, racketeering, whacking rivals and starting gang wars across the whole of New York City. Welcome to the family.
results.name: The Godfather: The Game

results.deck: State of Emergency is a free-roaming action game published by Rockstar Games. It features tons of crazy weapons and fight moves to beat up anyone that comes in your way.
results.name: State of Emergency

results.deck: The cover athlete for NCAA 06 is former Michigan Wolverine and Heisman Trophy Winner Desmond Howard.
results.name: NCAA Football 06

results.deck: In Blazing Angels, you take the role of an American pilot and fly, shoot, and bomb your way through the German army along with some American buddies. The game "Secret Weapons Over Normandy" was cited by the developer as a big influence on this games development.
results.name: Blazing Angels: Squadrons of WWII

results.deck: ToCA Race Driver 3 is the third installment in the Race Driver series from Codemasters.
results.name: TOCA Race Driver 3

results.deck: A package of both Dead or Alive and a Dead or Alive 2 (recreated for the Xbox) both enabled with online play.
results.name: Dead or Alive Ultimate
